T02D3239:9b-1: ba su dh'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3239:9b-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas yi ge bam
T02D3239:9b-5: ser po yongs su gyur pa las zhal gcig phyag
T02D3239:9b-7: gzhon nu ma lang tsho la bab pa /
T02D3239:9b-8: rgyan dang gos kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3239:9b-9: 'bras drungs kyi snye ma'i mchog dang /
T02D3239:9b-10: rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bab pa'i bum pa phyag g-yon pa na bsnams shing /
T02D3239:9b-11: g-yas pas mchog sbyin par mdzad pa /
T02D3239:9b-12: dga' bar gyur pa'i 'khor du mas yongs su bskor
T02D3239:9b-13: zhing sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs
T02D3239:9b-14: pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbu brgyan pa /
T02D3239:10a-0: rang gi sa bon las snying gar skad cig @10a * //
T02D3239:10a-2: phyag rgya bcing bar bya ba ni lag pa gnyis
T02D3239:10a-3: khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis rtse sprad pa'i
T02D3239:10a-4: tshigs gsum pa ni nor rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3239:10a-5: de nas ba su dh'a ra ratna ni dha na shke tre sv'a h'a /
T02D3239:10a-6: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3239:10a-7: nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs so /
